content.value:
The SerenityOS Browser now passes the Acid3 test! ğŸ¥³ğŸğŸŒ

AFAIK we're the first new open source browser to reach this milestone since the test originally came out.

This has been a team effort over the last couple of weeks, and I'm so proud of everyone who contributed! ğŸ¤“â¤ï¸

photo.alt: Screenshot of the Acid3 web standards compliance test in SerenityOS Browser. The score is 100/100.
